reviewText: The delicate balance of our planet's biodiversity hinges on the cornerstone elements that plants provide us. The air we breathe, the water we drink, and the food we eat are all reliant on healthy and vibrant ecosystems. Over 80% of all plant life on earth is found in tropical regions. In our world today a third of these plants are in peril of being lost forever. Take a tour of McBryde & Allerton and experience Kauai's south shore gardens through the eyes of the experts.
